metadata.title: Delisa New Indian/Pakistani Eid Special Party/Ethnic wear Georgette Straight Ghagra Style Salwar for Womens LTT
features: STYLE :- This suit is Ready to wear. Just select your size & order. (3 pcs set)
SIZE CHART GUIDE :- The Ready Garment Size at Bust for all the above sizes in inches will be as following, (XS-36); (S-38); (M-40);( L-42);( XL-44);(XXL-46) PLUS SIZE (0X-48);(1X-50);(2X-52) (3X-54)

Type :- Full Stitched || Style :- Ghaghra || Top Fabric :-Faux Georgette ||Bottom Fabric:- Faux Georgette || Dupatta Fabric : As per Shown in Picture || Inner Fabric : Santoon || if you want the length shorter, then please inform us within 24 hours after the order
Kameez Length (Top):- 44-45 inches.... if you want the length shorter, then please inform us within 24 hours after the order . If not Message received the maximum length will be kept as mentioned
description: Delisa Fashion designer fancy traditional wears which show Indian/Pakistani traditional form its glamorous look bring out the true diva in and reinvent your true self add grace and charm to your appearance in this beautiful designer embroidery work is a perfect fit for all parties &occasion where you want to show your appearance. if u have a any problems or complaint please contact us :+919913359938, available (WHATSAPP & WECHAT) Email :-delisafashion2020@gmail.com
